name: Unlogged
long_description:
Unlogged is an open-source platform that supercharges Java development by offering:

One-Click Mocking: Instantly mock databases, APIs, and downstream services, simplifying isolated environment testing.

Real-Time Performance Tracking: Monitors method performance in real-time, identifying bottlenecks quickly.

Auto-Generated Unit Tests: Automatically creates unit tests from API traffic, boosting test suite maintenance and promoting a robust testing culture.

CI Integration & Code Coverage: Integrates with CI systems for replay runs, providing code coverage statistics for thorough testing insight.
one_liner: Replay Production Traffic Locally and Ensure 0 Production bugs
